CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(ComplaintType__c,"Reclamo Scritto") && ISPICKVAL(CorrectionRight__c,"Si"), IF(CorrectionDocumentEmissionDay__c < SendDate__c + 120 && CorrectionDocumentEmissionDay__c >=SendDate__c + 60 , 25, IF(CorrectionDocumentEmissionDay__c < SendDate__c + 180 && CorrectionDocumentEmissionDay__c >= SendDate__c + 120, 50, IF(CorrectionDocumentEmissionDay__c >= SendDate__c + 180, 75, 0))), null)
CustomField.label: Indennizzo per rettifica fatturazione
